Name: Deadhunt
About the game: Deadhunt is a first-person arcade shooter (FPS) game that merges the best features of arcade and FPS action games with fresh ideas and new twists. An addictive 3D-shooter game where you consistently develop your character by killing endless monsters and getting bonuses. Stay as long as possible on fighting pits against hordes of zombies and skeletons. Features: - Non-stop adrenaline-pumping gameplay - 4 episodes with total of 40 missions - Two additional modes: Survival and Greed - Armed combat against multiple enemies - Three classes of monsters with 50 kinds of weapons - Unique system of monster destruction - Seven varieties of weapons plus grenades - 10 runes and 37 bonuses, including Slowdown, Double Damage, Nuke - Remote picking of bonuses, runes and weapons - 10 varieties of monsters' armor - 15 original soundtracks - Four difficulty levels *** The game was released in 2005.
